TopicTitle: Epidemic Stupidity followed by Epidemic Measles

Articles.Content:
Seems like the UK has an outbreak of Measles on its hands...

Gimme teh news google!

Sadly someone has died from this. With a few hundred infected. There is a rush for vaccinations.

It is believed that a factor in the outbreak has been diminished herd immunity from parents opting out of vaccinations. this is from a debunked paper released many years ago...

MMR vaccine controversy
If it wasn't for the fact that innocent people (children mostly) suffer because of this I'd say let them do what they want and let Darwin sort them out...
